channel.title: Rotating platform teleport puzzle: platforms aren't rotating
channel.description:
even "funnier" when i teleport into the room, my characters is constantly spinning around even though the platform is not moving. when i try to go into the nearest teleport ball i do not go up to the higher level platforms.
this picture is from a video walkthrough i was using to figure out what was wrong. i am not having any luck actually taking a real in game screenshot right now.
![blackmesabugreport|647x500](upload://vCrm1NrUkjPXKztBOY98g0GXpLa.png) map: bm_c3a2g at: 820 x, 400 y, 544 z version: 100001/24 100001 insecure windows 10 intel, gtx 1070.
